name: HINDU FORUM EUROPE
goal: Hindu Forum of Europe is a European Platforme for the over 2 million Hindus in Europe. It strives to represent the interests and concerns of the different Hindu Communities throughout Europe to the EU Institutions. It also tries to create more awareness amongst European policy makers, media, religious communities, etc about the Hindu Communities and the ethos, values and principles that Hinduism stands for.
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
We are following the following issues:
Non Discrimination on the grounds of Religion and Belief in the EU
Religious Freedom issues in Asia covered by the FORB Intergroup From the EU Parliament
Recognition of Hinduism throughout Europe
Legislation in relationship to Ayurveda- Traiditional Indian Medicine
Environmental Issues
